title: Provides for the licensing, regulation and protection of hunting ranch facilities
summary: Provides for the licensing, regulation and protection of hunting ranch facilities.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                          429

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M.  of  A.  MAGEE,  REILLY,  MARKEY, GUNTHER, BENEDETTO,
         CASTRO, P. LOPEZ -- Multi-Sponsored by -- M. of A.  BARCLAY,  BURLING,
         CALHOUN,  COOK,  CROUCH, DESTITO, DUPREY, FINCH, GIGLIO, HAWLEY, McDO-
         NOUGH, McENENY, MOLINARO, OAKS, TITONE -- read once  and  referred  to
         the Committee on Environmental Conservation

       AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to hunt-
         ing ranch facilities

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. The environmental conservation law is amended by  adding  a
    2  new section 11-1908 to read as follows:
    3  S 11-1908. HUNTING RANCH FACILITIES REGULATION AND PROTECTION.
    4    1.  ALL  ENTITIES  WHO  OWN, OPERATE OR MANAGE A FACILITY THAT HARBORS
    5  PRIVATELY-OWNED, NON-NATIVE GAME ANIMALS MAY CHARGE A FEE TO  TAKE  SUCH
    6  ANIMALS UPON RECEIPT OF A HUNTING RANCH FACILITY LICENSE.
    7    2.  THE  OWNER  OR LESSEE OF WHOLLY ENCLOSED LANDS OR AN ENTIRE ISLAND
    8  MAY APPLY TO THE DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE AND  MARKETS  FOR  A  HUNTING
    9  RANCH  FACILITY  LICENSE. THE HOLDER OF A HUNTING RANCH FACILITY LICENSE
   10  MAY PURCHASE, POSSESS, BREED, REAR,  AND  HARVEST  BY  SHOOTING  ON  THE
   11  FACILITY PREMISES, CERVIDS OR ANY OTHER HOOFED, DOMESTIC OR NON-DOMESTIC
   12  ANIMALS.    A  HUNTING RANCH FACILITY LICENSE SHALL BE ISSUED OR RENEWED
   13  FOR A TERM OF TEN YEARS AT A MAXIMUM COST OF FIFTY DOLLARS. THE  DEPART-
   14  MENT  OF  AGRICULTURE  AND MARKETS SHALL PRESCRIBE AND FURNISH FORMS FOR
   15  APPLICATION FOR SUCH LICENSE. INFORMATION  ON  THE  LICENSE  APPLICATION
   16  SHALL  INCLUDE  LICENSEE  NAME,  LOCATION OF HUNTING RANCH FACILITY, AND
   17  PROOF OF STATE ANIMAL HEALTH COMPLIANCE. THE LICENSE SHALL BE ISSUED  NO
   18  MORE THAN THIRTY DAYS AFTER SUCCESSFULLY COMPLETING APPLICATION REQUIRE-
   19  MENTS.
   20    3.  NO ANIMALS CAPTURED FROM THE WILD, ORIGINATING FROM A ZOO, PETTING
   21  ZOO, OR CIRCUS SHALL BE HUNTED FOR SPORT ON A HUNTING RANCH FACILITY.

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD03559-01-1

       A. 429                              2

    1    4. THE FOLLOWING REQUIREMENTS SHALL APPLY TO  THE  DESIGNATED  HUNTING
    2  AREA:
    3    A.  THE HUNTING AREA SHALL BE COMPLETELY ENCLOSED BY FENCING AND ALLOW
    4  GAME ANIMALS THE OPPORTUNITY TO EXERCISE  THEIR  NATURAL  INSTINCTS  AND
    5  ABILITIES TO ELUDE BEING HARVESTED.
    6    B. ALL HOOFED ANIMALS SHALL BE ON THE PREMISES TWO CALENDAR DAYS PRIOR
    7  TO BEING HUNTED.
    8    C.  ALL HUNTERS WITHIN THE HUNTING AREA SHALL BE UNDER THE SUPERVISION
    9  OF A GUIDE, WHO WILL ENSURE THAT HUNTERS ABIDE BY STANDARDS  OF  ETHICAL
   10  HUNTING.
   11    5.  THE  HOLDER  OF A HUNTING RANCH FACILITY LICENSE SHALL DISCLOSE IN
   12  WRITING TO PATRONS THAT ALL ANIMALS PRESENT IN  THE  DESIGNATED  HUNTING
   13  AREA ARE PRIVATELY-OWNED ANIMALS.
   14    6.  LICENSEES  SHALL NOT ADVERTISE OR OTHERWISE OFFER A GUARANTEE THAT
   15  PATRONS WILL HARVEST AN ANIMAL.
   16    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to hunting ranch facilities
